i18nExamples.simpleTextKey: [en] This is a simple single entry key/value pair
i18nExamples.simpleTextKeyWithSingleVar: [en] This should container a number { count }.
i18nExamples.simpleTextKeyWithManyVars: [en] This is a simple { count1 } of { count2 } and { count3 }.
i18nExamples.messageBasedOnItemCount: [en] No items selected | You have { count } item selected | You have { count } items selected

changeFlight.info: [en] You can {action} until {limit} minutes from departure.
